product_overview: NestTask is a comprehensive task and academic management system tailored for students and educators. It streamlines organization through unified management of daily routines, assignments, study materials, and course information across web and mobile platforms.
core_goals: Provide secure and role-based user authentication and profile management.
Enable efficient task management with categorization, prioritization, and deadline tracking.
Facilitate academic management including routines, course materials, and lecture slides access.
Offer powerful search and filtering capabilities across tasks and academic content.
Deliver timely notifications to keep users informed of deadlines and updates.
Equip administrators with a dashboard for user, content, and analytics management.
Ensure high performance, responsive design, and offline capabilities for optimal user experience.
Maintain data privacy and security employing robust backend policies and environment protections.
key_features: User authentication with login, signup, password recovery, and role-based access control (User, Admin, Super Admin).
Task management supporting CRUD operations, categorization, status tracking, drag-and-drop reordering, and deadline visualization.
Academic management features including daily/weekly routines, course information, study materials repository, and lecture slide viewer.
Global search functionality with filtering options for tasks by status, category, and date.
Push and in-app notifications integrated via Capacitor and Firebase for real-time alerts.
Admin dashboard for user account management, content control, and system usage analytics with visualizations.
Performance optimizations such as lazy loading, caching, and list virtualization.
Responsive and accessible UI with animations and offline support for seamless use on various devices.
Security implementations including Supabase Row Level Security, environment variable protections, and secure data storage.
user_flow_summary: Users sign up or log in using secure authentication and can recover passwords if needed.
Users access their personalized dashboard to view, create, and manage tasks sorted by categories and statuses.
Users manage academic routines and access course resources along with lecture slides.
Users perform global searches and apply filters to quickly find tasks and study materials.
Users receive push and in-app notifications about deadlines and system updates.
Admins log into the admin dashboard to manage users, courses, and monitor analytics.
The application supports smooth navigation with responsive design and maintains session through lifecycle hooks and offline caching.
validation_criteria: Authentication workflows are tested for security and role-based access restrictions.
Task CRUD operations work correctly with category assignment and status updates.
Academic management features correctly display routines, courses, study materials, and lecture slides.
Search results are accurate and filters apply as expected.
Push notifications arrive timely and navigate users to relevant content within the app.
Admin dashboard reflects accurate user data, analytics, and allows content management.
Performance benchmarks for lazy loading and caching are met to ensure load times and responsiveness.
UI adapts fluidly across devices and offline mode retains basic app functionality.
Security validations confirm data privacy standards and environment variable confidentiality.
